name: Gift to the State
text: Governments of the old world would sometimes prompt the elite and the businessmen of the realm to donate their wealth, either out of patriotism or in exchange for concessions. So shall it hold true with this era's water merchants.

uniques: Comment [Gain a sum of Water depending on the current technological era]
Gain [1200] [Gold] <starting from the [New Future era]> <hidden from users>

name: Appoint a Great Administrator
text: Recent talks have been disconcerting. People in outlying settlements are growing restless. We should appoint a new administrator to those settlements to keep the situation under control.

choices.text: It shall be done at once.

name: Social Reforms
text: Your advisors have proposed a number of policies that are of potential benefit to our nation. They are extremely radical, however, and it is likely that many will not take well to the changes.

choices.text: Reassign the advisors somewhere they cannot cause our nation harm.
Let's implement the proposals and prepare for backlash.

name: Technological Breakthrough
text: Our spy networks have reported some concerning scientific developments from rival factions. They advise an immediate investigation to determine if we can make use of their research.

uniques: Comment [Gain Science equal to ~5% of a new technology's cost]
Gain [1250] [Science] <during the [New Future era]> <hidden from users>

choices.text: Better to cripple their efforts before they become a threat.
uniques: Comment [Receive 2 free Infantry units depending on the era, with a 1-in-10 chance of receiving an extra spy]
Gain an extra spy <with [10]% chance> <hidden from users>
[2] free [Infantry] units appear <during the [Rebuilding era]> <hidden from users>
[2] free [NBC Infantry] units appear <starting from the [Industrial era]> <before the [New Future era]> <hidden from users>
[2] free [Exo-Trooper] units appear <starting from the [New Future era]> <hidden from users>

name: Radiation Outbreak
text: One of our settlements has experienced an outbreak of radiation sickness due to prolonged exposure to contaminated materials. The outbreak has been contained, but at significant cost.

choices.text: Just another day in the wasteland...

name: Former Elite Captured
text: A surviving member of the pre-Cataclysm world's elite has fallen into our custody. While his crimes are numerous, if he is shown leniency, he could yet be transformed into a productive member of society, if given the incentive to reform and make amends.

choices.text: This is his one and only chance for atonement. Assign him to supervised hard labor.
The people are out for blood. Have him executed in public.

name: Stalkers
text: A band of so-called stalkers has been sighted scavenging the wasteland near our capital. It is clear they are hardened from recent combat and could aid us immensely if persuaded to pledge their services to us.

choices.text: Their operations are dangerous to our people. They must be dealt with.
Leave them be. They're not harming us and we can't afford to contract them.
See that they are fairly compensated for their services.

name: Digging Wells
text: There is one thing we cannot escape - the need for clean water. As fortune would hold it, an engineering team has just stepped forward, proposing a project which would create a new source of water for our people.

choices.text: Let us not waste any time, then.
uniques: Only available <when number of [Well-Digger] is less than [1]> <hidden from users>

choices.text: Another team has already been contracted, but we would still make use of their services.
uniques: Only available <when number of [Well-Digger] is more than [0]> <hidden from users>

name: A Great Raider appears!
text: The raiders terrorizing the wastes have recently come together under a new leader who has demonstrated himself to be far more ruthless than anyone we have fought since the Cataclysm. Now they are coming after us.

choices.text: Be ready to defend our homeland.

name: Hero's Comeback!
text: Sightings of the impossible have been reported in distant wastelands. The Hero who saved humanity from the Purge Robots of the Cataclysm has returned. But how can this be? Everyone knows he vanished for good after the Cataclysm.

choices.text: Even if it isn't the Hero, he can still become the symbol of hope we need. We should recruit him at once.

name: Bountiful Harvest
text: Owing to breakthroughs in water treatment research, local farmers throughout the nation are reporting an amazing surplus of food. Rarely have we seen such bountiful harvests since before the Cataclysm!

choices.text: The people will be eating well this year!
